title: Beef
subtitle: The only red meat that matters
desc1: Beef (Bos taurus), is a type of red meat, obtained from cows. The best beef can be obtained from early maturing, special beef breeds. A high-quality beef has a specific characteristics: Firm, velvety, bright red in colour and well-marbled. It has a smooth, creamy white and well distributed fat.
desc2: There are a variety of beef products, and cuts of beef, which includes hamburgers, steak and many more.
